scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.docs: npm run docs:html && npm run docs:md
scripts.docs:all: npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out docs && npx concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --dir-name-as-title temp-docs > README.md && npx showdown makehtml -i README.md -o README.html && npx rimraf docs/temp
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --patch --registry $NPM_REGISTRY_PUBLISH
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --minor --registry $NPM_REGISTRY_PUBLISH
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --major --registry $NPM_REGISTRY_PUBLISH
scripts.cover: npm run cover:unit && npm run cover:integration && npm run cover:report
